thread.title: 'American Horror Story: Hotel' Episode 2 Preview: Ghost Meltdown and Clown Face
thread.title_full: 'American Horror Story: Hotel' Episode 2 Preview: Ghost Meltdown and Clown Face

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'American Horror Story: Hotel' Episode 2 Preview: Ghost Meltdown and Clown Face
text:
Comments The sneak peek for next week's episode sees Lady GaGa flirting with Cheyenne Jackson, teases Naomi Campbell's arrival and many more. 
The terror has just begun on " American Horror Story : Hotel". Following the season premiere that was loaded with sexiness and creepiness, a preview for the next episode promises more intense and bloody scenes. Lady GaGa 's Countess Elizabeth is seen getting flirty with Cheyenne Jackson's Will Drake. Matthew Bomer 's Donovan has to handle Sarah Paulson 's Sally who is having a meltdown because her name is not found on the guest list. Naomi Campbell makes her debut in the episode as a fashion editor who does not get along with the Countess. Max Greenfield 's Gabriel is having a medical emergency situation and is taken to a hospital. The video also sees a woman being chased on the hotel's hallway, and a man with a clown face wielding a knife. "Hotel" returns with the new episode Wednesday, October 14 at 10 P.M. on FX. In "Chutes and Ladders", fashion mogul Will Drake brings couture to the Hotel Cortez, a model catches The Countess's eye, and John learns about the hotel's sadistic first owner.
